name: The Chopping Block
description:
Description:

Cotton Cloud Productions presents their first game title, 'The Chopping Block'. 

Summary: You go to a famous butcher who lives in the mountains to only find out you are next on the menu! Escape with the help of ghosts that were the Butcher's previous victims by solving puzzles and evading the Butcher's axe. It's either that or be tossed into the meat grinder.
